actions.action: Click "Contribution settings" dropdown link in navigation
Fill "Session type" to the name field
actions.expectedResult: Name field is filled with session type
Session type is created and saved

actions.action: Verify session type appears in session types list
actions.expectedResult: Session type is listed in session types
Title field is focused for input

actions.action: Type "Session title" in the title field
actions.expectedResult: Title field contains unique session title

actions.action: Type "Session description" in the description field
Verify session appears in sessions table
actions.expectedResult: Sessions list shows the new session
